name: Riker says "You're wrong!"
description:
What is this?

This is a single-button soundboard playing clips of Jonathan Frakes saying you're wrong.

Why is this?

Because I thought this supercut of Beyond Belief: Fact or Fiction was really funny, and I wanted to play with audio on the web.

Also, there are plenty of fart apps.

Can I fork this?

Sure, go ahead and fork this on GitHub!
